text: You've got yourself a little friend over there?
So we are back at Parque Kennedy yet again.
You're probably wondering why we are here.

And the answer is because my husband Sam is
a cat lover.

And there are hundreds of cats here and he
decided 'hey' it might be good idea to go
pick up some cat food and come feed the cats.
So today we're here to feed the kittens.
I'm the embodiment of a cat lady.
